modName: Bouncy Bodices and Booties for UNPB and UNP also BBP BBPx 7B
summary: This mod adds a range of sexy but still tasteful leather and chain mail bodices and hotpants for female characters to the game. They feature animated breasts, slightly transparent parts and support weight slider scaling. They are made for various UNP based bodies.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i68.photobucket.com/albums/i4/Yngling/logo_BBB_01.png[/img]

[b][color=#b98d73]Current version:[/color][/b] [color=green]3e2b release:[/color][/center]

[b][color=#b98d73]News:[/color][/b]

Added: BB Merchant at Belethor's General Goods in the city of Whiterun has BB items and Smithing book. Update esp if you have conflicts with the merchant lists edits of earlier versions.

Added: All clothing version optional esp with BB Merchant at Belethor's General Goods in the city of Whiterun

[b][color=#b98d73]Known issues on Bouncy Belts & Stockings:[/color][/b]

- There might be slight clipping in the meshes here and there.

- Some models might not show when partially in water (and the camera above the waterline). I will fix this when I have a solution.

- The textures still need some fine tuning here and there and more versions might be added.

- 7B Body variants - This conversion is based on the SeveNBase Cleavage body, so it works best with the SeveNBase Original body or the Natural body by Crosscrusade. There will be clipping with the Bombshell body if the bodice top isn't equipped.

[b][color=#b98d73]Bouncy Bodices and Booties: Notes on release 3[/color][/b]

- Update: Thanks to Turbosundance who has been working on porting the meshes to the UNP body, we now offer versions for UNP and UNP with BBP. Due to different scaling of the UNP body which the meshes needed adjustment for, these versions are best used with smaller chest sizes.

- MrTroubleMaker has made the UNPB without BBP meshes for the base UNPB version. These meshes are the same as his original, UNPB BBP ones, just without animations.

- 7B SeveNBase conversion by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2304498]Wast1980[/url]

- If your hotpants insert shows up below the hotpants model, unequip both and dress up in the hotpants first before you equip the insert.

- Thank a bunch Petrovich' for your Simply Clothes mesh which I was able to use nicely for the hotpants.

- Please upload some pics, I did a ton of fine tuning on lighting and specular settings but I have only my own system to go by; having more references makes for better textures in the next release.

[color=#727272]~[/color]

[b][color=#b98d73]Description:[/color][/b]

This mod adds a range of craftable, bouncy, slightly transparent, but still tasteful bodices and hotpants models + optional inserts for female characters to the game.

The leather versions can be found under your leather tab, the chainmail versions all require the Advanced Armor Smithing perk as well as metal specialty smithing skills depending on the materials. They aren't for sale at Radiant Raiment anymore.

Pick up the book "Notes on Chainmail Smithing" at a local pawnshop to get started. Even though the skimpiness of the bodices suggest otherwise: I tried my best to keep this mod immersive; it is intended to be balanced, fitting to the world (up to a certain degree, *coughs*) and not hand out candy instantly.

The bodices are roughly based on the vanilla barkeeper model but heavily adjusted and retextured in high resolution. The meshes are made by MrTroublemaker who has been a great help in perfecting the meshes for this mod's specific purposes. The hotpants mesh is from Petrovich' Simply Clothes mod. Turbosundance has ported the meshes to UNP and UNP with BBP.

This is not a replacer.

All your bodices are belong to us.

And your booties too.

[color=#727272]~[/color]

[b][color=red]Requirements:[/color][/b]

BBP version require a BBP skeleton. Without a BBP skeleton the game will CTD.

[color=#727272]~[/color]

[b][color=#b98d73]Installing:[/color][/b]

Best to use NMM or other mod installer.

1. Select any main file for the body type you use. Install

2. For the update to either 3e2a or 3e2a.c If NMM asks you if this is an upgrade, select "NO" to install normally

[color=#727272]~[/color]

[b][color=#b98d73]Uninstalling:[/color][/b]

- Remove the .esp and .bsa from your data folder

[color=#727272]~[/color]

[b][color=#b98d73]Highly Recommended:[/color][/b]

- I highly recommend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20415]Brokefoot's UNP Mashup[/url] Though technically not UNPB BBP, the pieces combine well with this mod.

- MrTroubleMaker has ported Brokefoot's Mashup to UNPB BBP and other bodies, you can find it [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22166]here[/url].

- MrTroublemaker has made [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20227]his own[/url] conversion for UNPB-BBP: A replacer for barkeeper & other vanilla clothes.

[color=#727272]~[/color]

[b][color=#b98d73]Credits:[/color][/b]

- First of all: A big thanks to MrTroubleMaker for his barkeeper mesh with bbp support and for his cooperation in the making of this mod and permission for me to use it.

- Props to Turbosundance for his work on porting the meshes to UNP and UNP-BBP.

- Thanks to Petrovich for making his Simply Clothes meshes available as a resource.

- My deepest respect and thanks to Dimon99, Calypso and xp32 for their awesome work on the UNP, UNPB and UNPB BBP bodies.

- My gratitude for Brokefoot's work on his great armor sets and inspiring me to add my own little addition to the growing list of separate pieces of garments for UNP.

- Thanks to MAK07 for his belt mesh from the Armor Remodeled mod.

- Thanks to Dimon99 (again) for the UNP resource pack and the stockings meshes.

- Apachii for the great hair [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

_ Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2304498]Wast1980[/url] for the 7B conversion

[color=#727272]~[/color]

[b][color=#b98d73]Why this mod?[/color][/b]

I have always been a fan of the top half of the barkeeper dress: sexy but still realistic for Skyrim's setting. There are much better options for lower body wear, especially Brokefoot's sets for UNP and I completely subscribe to his "mix & match" doctrine: it's much more fun and immersive if you have a choice what to wear on which part of your character. After using MrTroubleMaker's barkeeper replacer with jiggly support, everything fell in place and I started to work on this mod.

[color=#727272]~[/color]

[b][color=#b98d73]Copyright and stuff:[/color][/b]

Please do not upload this mod or changed versions or parts of it on other websites.

You have permission to do whatever you please with the textures as long as it stays on the Nexus. If you want to port this mod to other body mods, please contact me.

Please note: Requests for making use of the bodice mesh found in the mod should go to MrTroublemaker.


[color=#727272]~[/color]

I hope some of you will enjoy this addition. I'm happy to return a small favor for all the great mods made by this community.

p.s. If you like this mod, please endorse <3

Dikr
